code: import{Box,Typography,useTheme}from"@mui/material";import{GridOverlays,DataGrid}from"@mui/x-data-grid";import{tokens}from"../../theme";import{mockDataInvoices}from"../../data/mockData";import Header from"../../components/Header";import{jsxs as _jsxs,jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";const Invoices=()=>{const theme=useTheme();const colors=tokens(theme.palette.mode);const columns=[{field:"id",headerName:"ID"},{field:"name",headerName:"Name",flex:1,cellClassName:"name-column--cell"},{field:"phone",headerName:"Phone Number",flex:1},{field:"email",headerName:"Email",flex:1},{field:"cost",headerName:"Cost",flex:1,renderCell:params=>{/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(Typography,{color:colors.greenAccent[500],children:["$",params.row.cost]});}},{field:"date",headerName:"Date",flex:1}];return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(Box,{m:"20px",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Header,{title:"INVOICES",subtitle:"List of Invoices Balances"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Box,{m:"40px 0 0 0",height:"75vh",sx:{"& .MuiDataGrid-root":{border:"none"},"& .MuiDataGrid-cell":{borderBottom:"none"},"& .name-column--cell":{color:colors.greenAccent[300]},"& .MuiDataGrid-columnHeader":{backgroundColor:colors.blueAccent[700],borderBottom:"none"},"& .MuiDataGrid-virtualScroller":{backgroundColor:colors.primary[400]},"& .MuiDataGrid-footerContainer":{borderTop:"none",backgroundColor:colors.blueAccent[700]},"& .MuiCheckbox-root":{color:"".concat(colors.greenAccent[200]," !important")},"& .MuiCheckbox-root":{color:"".concat(colors.greenAccent[200]," !important")}},children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(DataGrid,{checkboxSelection:true,rows:mockDataInvoices,columns:columns})})]});};export default Invoices;
